title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 565.2 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 565.2 - General

State Regulations
(a) The Vehicle and

Traffic Law of the State of New York is applicable and enforceable on property
maintained by the State University of New York, College at Plattsburgh. All
drivers are expected to comply with all campus traffic and parking regulations
and traffic ordinances of the City of Plattsburgh. (b) A complaint regarding any violation of
the Vehicle and Traffic Law, or the campus traffic and parking regulations, shall be processed in accordance with the requirements of the applicable
law. (c) All regulations pertaining
to motor vehicle registration and operation are enforceable 24 hours a day
throughout the entire year, except as otherwise prescribed by the University

Police. (d) Parking is prohibited
in those areas designated by posted signs. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
565.2

Amended, New

York State Register August 27, 2014/Volume XXXVI, Issue 34, eff. 8/27/2014

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
